extra: To make it easier to survive your first night, burn blocks of wood in a furnace to make charcoal. You can use this instead of coal to craft torches, which means you can go caving even if you haven't found coal.

tips.text: You can get string from killing spiders, or destroying cobwebs or tripwires.

extra: If you dye your sheep before breeding them, the resulting baby sheep will also be dyed. It will either be the color of one of its parents, or a combination of the two if they are compatible colors.
If you put on a pumpkin head, an enderman won't become hostile if you look at it. Weird but true!
